title: Lebanon PD officer recovering after accidental shooting
content:
LEBANON, Ind. (WISH) — A Lebanon police officer is recovering after accidentally shooting himself in the foot.
Sgt. Ted Boling was cleaning his firearm following training at the Boone County Jail Wednesday night when he accidentally shot his right foot, according to a Lebanon Police Department media release.
He was taken to St. Vincent Indianapolis Hospital.
He’s expected to make a full recovery.
The incident remains under investigation.
